posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase or trade for a few nice condition 1912 C46 Imperial Tobacco cards in the Excellent condition grade without creases:

Wells, Jersey City
McCarty, Newark
Byers, Baltimore
Curtis, Montreal

Thanks in advance,


Patrick

Hi Patrick,

I'll check and see if I have any of these to offer you.  

The Curtis will be quite a challenge in EX grade...as the last card of the set, it tended to take a beating...don't think I ever saw one better than VG...

posts.post_title: Looking for catchers in the C46 set
posts.post_content:
Thanks for the response Bosox Blair.

I'm still looking for C46 catchers. Looks like I'm only going to find catcher cards for 7 of the 8 teams. No catchers for Providence.

Hope to pick up nice examples of catchers on the other 7 teams. Picked up 3 catchers on eBay recently. So far I have: McAllister (Buffalo), Graham (Rochester), and Phelps (Toronto).

Thanks,

Patrick

Patrick -- this won't help you get a card for the Providence catcher, but Bradley Kocher (card # 82) was also a catcher for Toronto.

Regards,

Richard.

[quote name="cdn_collector" post=1032421]Patrick -- this won't help you get a card for the Providence catcher, but Bradley Kocher (card # 82) was also a catcher for Toronto.

Regards,

Richard.[/QUOTE]

Nice catch (haha) Richard!

I do have a very nice card of Kocher, Patrick (see scan).  PM me if you want to discuss trade/sale.

posts.post_title: Have a Toronto player on the way already
posts.post_content:
Thanks Richard and Blair. I already have an Eddie Phelps (Toronto) on the way. I was aware of the Bradley Kocher card since it was the first C46 I ever owned. Sold or traded my example away a few years back.


Thanks again,


Patrick

posts.post_title: Putting together a run on C46 catchers
posts.post_content:
Decided to work on putting together all 12 of the catchers in the C46 Imperial Tobacco set. 

Looking for creaseless examples with minimal chipping. I will pay strong for nice examples!

Here are the remaining nine C46s I'm searching for:

#46 Johnnie Butler (Jersey City)
#47 Fred Mitchell (Buffalo)
#56 Robert Wells (Jersey City)
#62 Fred Jacklitsch (Rochester)
#74 William Byers (Baltimore)
#78 Jack Hardy (Montreal)
#82 Bradley Kocher (Toronto)
#89 Lew McCarty (Newark)
#90 Harry Curtis (Montreal)

Thanks,


Patrick

Hi Patrick,

I have the Jacklitsch you are looking for as well...BVG 7.

I'll send you an e-mail tomorrow.

Thanks Blair!

Here's my updated list of seven (7) C46 catchers still wanted:

#46 Johnnie Butler (Jersey City)
#47 Fred Mitchell (Buffalo)
#56 Robert Wells (Jersey City)
#74 William Byers (Baltimore)
#78 Jack Hardy (Montreal)
#89 Lew McCarty (Newark)
#90 Harry Curtis (Montreal)

Thanks,


Patrick
